name: FireBase_Validate finding details response when finding ID is not found -- @1.1

steps.name: Given FireBase_User sends GET request to fetch finding details for finding ID "213a1750-e18e-4dc3-bfc8-b54b83485200"
When FireBase_the user receives the finding details response
Then FireBase_the status code returned should be 404 for not found error

And FireBase_the message should contain "Finding with ID 213a1750-e18e-4dc3-bfc8-b54b83485200 not found."
